MENU_ITEMS.title: GO BACK
MENU_ITEMS.description: Exit the help menu. Press ENTER.

MENU_ITEMS.title: GRAB
MENU_ITEMS.description: Grab an object within your reach.

MENU_ITEMS.title: POUR
MENU_ITEMS.description: Pour the currently held object. Only works on items such as honey jars.

MENU_ITEMS.title: STEAL
MENU_ITEMS.description: Steal gold from the bear. Only works while in close proximity, and while the bear is distracted.

MENU_ITEMS.title: QUIT
MENU_ITEMS.description: Quit the game and return to the main menu.
